mapper.sql: id, username, pwd, email, phone, status, createtime, last_login_time, merch_id, is_master, first_login
mapper.insert: insert into loan_proxy_user (id, username, pwd, email, phone, status, createtime, last_login_time, merch_id, is_master, first_login) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{merchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isMaster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
username,
pwd,

createtime,

mapper.update:
update loan_proxy_user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
merch_id = #{merchId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_master = #{isMaster,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_login = #{firstLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update loan_proxy_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, merch_id = #{merchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_master = #{isMaster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_login = #{firstLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT pu.id id, pu.username username, pu.email email, pu.phone phone, pu.`status` status, pu.first_login firstLogin, DATE_FORMAT( pu.createtime, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) createtime, is_master isMaster, DATE_FORMAT( pu.last_login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T' ) lastLoginTime, r.role_name roleName FROM `loan_proxy_user` pu LEFT JOIN loan_user_role_webapp ur ON ur.user_id = pu.id LEFT JOIN loan_role_webapp r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE pu.merch_id = #{merchId} AND pu.is_master = #{isMaster} ORDER BY pu.createtime
